summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2117, for the improvement of King Street from 9th Avenue South to 6th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same with 5 inch planks, roadway 42 feet in width with 12 foot walks on each side, under Ordinance No. 21211 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
